name: Etiolation
description:
Journey into the caverns below to find what lurks beneath! A friendly companion will aid you in your quest, but to survive the ordeals of the underground you not only have make it, but your new pal does too!

A short game made by myself and @spook2spook as part of Ludum Dare 46, our first ever gamejam! I was on programming and design while they handled graphics and audio.

Controls:
WASD to move, space to jump
Mouse to pick up/throw
R to restart
